Method Detail

convertStrToBoolean

public static boolean convertStrToBoolean(String string)
Convert a string value to a boolean. If the value is a common positive string value such as "1", "true", "y" or "yes" then TRUE is returned. For any other value or null, FALSE is returned.

Parameters:
string - value to test
Returns:
true if the string resolves to a positive value.

convertStrToInt

public static int convertStrToInt(String string,
                                  int defaultValue)
Convert a string to an int value. If an error occurs during the conversion, the default value is returned instead. Unlike the Integer.parseInt(String) method, this method will not throw an exception.

Parameters:
string - value to test
defaultValue - value to return in case of difficulting converting.
Returns:
the int value contained in the string, otherwise the default value.

convertStrToLong

public static long convertStrToLong(String string,
                                    long defaultValue)
Convert a string to a long value. If an error occurs during the conversion, the default value is returned instead. Unlike the Integer.parseInt(String) method, this method will not throw an exception.

Parameters:
string - value to test
defaultValue - value to return in case of difficulting converting.
Returns:
the int value contained in the string, otherwise the default value.

tokenizeString

public static List<String> tokenizeString(String inputString,
                                          String seperator)
Break apart a string using a tokenizer into a List of Strings.

Parameters:
inputString - a string containing zero or or more segments
seperator - seperator to use for the split, or null for the default
Returns:
a List of Strings. An emtpy list is returned if inputString is null.
